SODApplication.OffenceDescription: Failing to coply with a magistrate's order made under section 8AA(6) of Road Traffic (Driving-Offence Points) Ordinance, Cap.375
SODApplication.OffenceDescriptionChinese: 沒有遵從裁判官根據《道路交通(違例駕駛記分)條例》 (第375章)第8AA(6)條作出的命令
SODApplication.ChargeParticular: Information has been laid that you (A), without reasonable excuse, failed to comply with an order made under section 8AA(6) of Road Traffic (Driving-Offence Points) Ordinance, Cap.375 by a magistrate on (B) to attend and complete a driving improvement course at your own cost by (A).
SODApplication.ChargeParticularChinese: 有人提出告發，指稱你(A)，無合理辯解的情況下，沒有遵從裁判官根據《道路交通(違例駕駛記分)條例》 (第375章)第8AA(6)條作出的命令，即須(A)前自費修習和完成駕駛改進課程。
SODApplication.ContraryToLaw: Section 8AA(7) of Road Traffic (Driving-Offence Points) Ordinance, Cap.375
SODApplication.ContraryToLawChinese: 《道路交通(違例駕駛記分)條例》 (第375章)第7條
